title: Killing Kate
description: Jenna has a split personality. As Jenna, she's reasonable. As Kate, she's dangerous.When Jenna finds out about her abusive father's death, she couldn't care less. It does mean changes in her life, and seeing more of Kate is just one of them. It also means that someone from Jenna's past is looking for something she doesn't even realize she has, but Kate knows all about.As Jenna slips further into her dark side by confronting her past, she needs Kate to protect her from those who hurt her before and can hurt her again. Kate is out for revenge, but Jenna isn't sure she can hang on to herself as Kate slowly takes over.Recommended for readers 18+ due to sensitive content and mature issues.
author: Lila Veen
